name: git-ai-committer
description: Automatically generates commit messages and commits changes using AI

gitAiCommitter.preferredAIProvider.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Required**: You must explicitly select an AI provider. Use the command `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` for configuration.

Preferred AI provider for generating commit messages
gitAiCommitter.preferredAIProvider.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration
enumDescriptions: Use Editor Built-in AI (Copilot) for commit messages
Use Google Gemini for commit messages

gitAiCommitter.primaryProviderModel.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Model to use with the primary AI provider (optional, defaults to provider's default)
gitAiCommitter.primaryProviderModel.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

First backup AI provider if primary fails
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1Model.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Model to use with the first backup AI provider (optional, defaults to provider's default)
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider1Model.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Second backup AI provider if primary and first backup fail
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2Model.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Model to use with the second backup AI provider (optional, defaults to provider's default)
gitAiCommitter.backupProvider2Model.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.geminiApiKey.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Google Gemini API key for generating commit messages
gitAiCommitter.geminiApiKey.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.geminiModel.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Gemini model to use (optional, defaults to gemini-flash-lite-latest)
gitAiCommitter.geminiModel.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.openRouterApiKey.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

OpenRouter API key for generating commit messages
gitAiCommitter.openRouterApiKey.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.openRouterModel.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

OpenRouter model to use (optional, defaults to google/gemini-2.0-flash-lite-preview-02-05:free)
gitAiCommitter.openRouterModel.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.openaiApiKey.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

OpenAI API key for generating commit messages
gitAiCommitter.openaiApiKey.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.openaiModel.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

OpenAI model to use (optional, defaults to gpt-4o)
gitAiCommitter.openaiModel.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.anthropicApiKey.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Anthropic API key for generating commit messages
gitAiCommitter.anthropicApiKey.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.anthropicModel.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Anthropic model to use (optional, defaults to claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620)
gitAiCommitter.anthropicModel.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.inactivityDelay.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Seconds to wait after you stop typing before checking for changes to commit
gitAiCommitter.inactivityDelay.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.minCommitDelay.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Minimum seconds between actual commits to prevent rapid consecutive commits
gitAiCommitter.minCommitDelay.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.versionBumpingEnabled.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

Automatically increment version numbers in package.json on each commit
gitAiCommitter.versionBumpingEnabled.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

gitAiCommitter.ignoredFilePatterns.markdownDescription:
⚠️ **Use Settings Panel**: Run `Git AI Committer: Open Settings` command instead.

File patterns to ignore in auto-commits (one pattern per line)
gitAiCommitter.ignoredFilePatterns.deprecationMessage: Please use 'Git AI Committer: Open Settings' command for easier configuration

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
